name: MLB 9 Innings GM
description:
Enjoy 2018 MLB everyday!
Build the best Major League team in MLB 9 Innings GM!

OFFICIALLY LICENSED BY MLB
- Check out the realistic appearance of the top MLB players, officially licensed by MLBPA and MLBAM.
- Perfect Implementation of 30 American League and National League teams! Choose a team of your choice to play the game.

MLB TEAM MANAGEMENT GAME
- Become a GM and lead your team to become the World Series Champions.
- Recruit players through Scout, Trade and the FA Market.
- Reach high rankings in League and Ladder mode.
- Upgrade your players and use a variety of strategies to claim victory!

PLAY ALONG WITH MLB WITH DAILY PICK
- Predict the winner of an MLB Game daily.
- Get into the Hall of Fame by having the most correct predictions!

COMPETE TO BE THE TOP CLUB
- Establish your own Club with people from all over the world!
- Club vs. Club mode allows you to compete to be the best.
- Share strategic information to make your team stronger!

MLB PLAYER CARD COLLECTION
- Assemble a team of your favorite MLB players.
- Recruit and Upgrade your favorite players!
- Players with boosted stats are rotated monthly based on their actual MLB performance!

ⓒ 2018 MLB Advanced Media, L.P. Major League Baseball trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of MLB Advanced Media, L.P. All rights reserved. Visit www.MLB.com The Official Site of Major League Baseball.

OFFICIALLY LICENSED PRODUCT OF MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL PLAYERS ASSOCIATION-MLBPA trademarks and copyrighted works, including the MLBPA logo, and other intellectual property rights are owned and/or held by MLBPA and may not be used without MLBPA’s written consent. Visit www.MLBPLAYERS.com, the Players Choice on the web.

Device App Access Permission Notice

▶ Notice per access permission
Access permissions are requested in order for us to provide you with the following service when you use the app.

[Required]
None

[Optional]
- Notifications: The permission is required to send you push notifications regarding the game.
- Camera: The permission is required to take profile pictures for HIVE members.
- Contacts: The permission is required to find friends registered to contacts for HIVE members.
- Photos: The permission is required to save/load game screens and change profile pictures for HIVE members.

※ Please note that you can still enjoy the service excluding features related to the above without giving access permissions.

▶ How to remove access permissions
You can always change access permission settings whenever you'd like.

- Device Settings> Select the corresponding app> Choose either to enable/disable access

* Minimum Requirement
- Runs on any device that has at least 1 GB memory.

* iOS Minimum Requirement
- This game has been designed to be played on most devices.
- This game is recommended to be played on iPhone 5, iPad 2, or iPod 5G or higher versions.

* Network Game
- The game requires online connection. Please note that there will be a 800MB additional resource download when installed for the first time.
- Additional download will be proceeded even when the game screen is closed.

* This game supports English, 한글, 中文繁體, 日本語 and español.

* Items are available for purchase in this game.
